page.title: 13Winchfield - Social Concerns
page.content: The{expansion of Fleet}west of Hitches Lane is the greatest concern of Winch- field residents. 'Winchfield Court' - 33 luxury houses must be a 'one-off' development & any similar projects will be discouraged. 10 houses are proposed for Winchfield Hurst. Rail- road Heath is also ripe for develop- ment & plans are being discussed. There are{no doctor's or dentist's {surgeries}within the block & with the threatened closure of Fleet Hospital the nearest hospital will be Frimley or Basingstoke. Much of the area isn't on{mains drainage.}Should 'Old Barley Mow Farmhouse' be converted into a restaurant? There are conflicting views over the need for{industrial {units at Winchfield Station.}There is a{campaign for a swimming pool}in Hart District & the Leisure Centre is a possible site.
